Lincon Muteta (amụrụ na 18 Jenụwarị 1975) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe.
A mụrụ Muteta n'afọ 1975 na mpaghara Highfield nke Harare, ọ bụ nwa nke ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ anọ n'ime ezinụlọ sitere na Mutoko
Ọ malitere ịkpụ ihe n'afọ 1989 mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Harare, ma mesịa bụrụ onye enyemaka Danny Kanyemba
Moses Masaya gbara ya ume ịmalite ọrụ nke onwe ya dị ka onye na-akpụ ihe.
Muteta bụ onye na-ese ihe na Chapungu Sculpture Park na 1996-97

N'oge 2004–08, ọ gara ma gosipụta na ngosi otu na South Africa, Bahrain, Dubai, England, na Canada na Zimsculpt. E gosipụtala ọrụ ya na Spain, Germany, Holland, United States, Switzerland, Ireland, Belgium na Italy.
Ọ lụrụ nwanyị ma nwee ụmụaka nwanyị abụọ.
